name: Drums Hero PC
description: Drums hero PC is a rhythm game of playing drums with controller or keyboard. Each action has real drums sound feedback, bring you the professional drummer's experience! Let's play the music along with the rhythm!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i3 above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650, AMD HD 6750 or above DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
